verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H259>"One<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5061>plague<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and on <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he will <S%H7971>let<s%> you <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H2088>here.<s%> When he <S%H7971>lets<s%> you <S%H7971>go,<s%> he will <S%H1644>surely<s%> <S%H1644>drive<s%> you out from <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H3617>completely.<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> from his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and <S%H802>each<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> from her <S%H7468>neighbor<s%> for <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%> <S%H1571>Furthermore,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> [himself] was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> esteemed in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> [both] in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of Pharaoh's <S%H5650>servants<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'About <S%H2676>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> I am <S%H3318>going<s%> out into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> from the first-born of the <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> who <S%H3427>sits<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H5704>even<s%> to the first-born of the <S%H8198>slave<s%> <S%H8198>girl<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H7347>millstones;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born of the <S%H929>cattle<s%> as well.

'Moreover, there shall be a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> <S%H3644><s%> as there has not <S%H1961>been<s%> [before] and <S%H3644>such<s%> as shall <S%H3808>never<s%> be <S%H3254>again.<s%>

'But against <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%> shall not [even] <S%H2782>bark,<s%> <S%H3956><s%> <S%H4480>whether<s%> against <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>understand<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6395>makes<s%> a <S%H6395>distinction<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to me and <S%H7812>bow<s%> themselves before me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3318>'Go<s%> out, you and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7272>follow<s%> you,' and <S%H310>after<s%> that I will <S%H3318>go<s%> out." And he <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in <S%H2750>hot<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6547>"Pharaoh<s%> will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you, <S%H4616>so<s%> that My <S%H4159>wonders<s%> will be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>performed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> yet the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he did not <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>
